section.title: Disable HP Printing and Imaging
section.para:
Disables HP printing and imaging. The hplip service is used to support HP printing and imaging services.
hplip

If printing is not enabled and the service is not vital to the operation of the system, it is recommended to disable the service. Note that for the operating systems listed below where the Service Name is '-', there is no service to be disabled. If OS Lockdown detects that the package is installed, it indicates that the Administrator should manually remove the package if it is not required.

row.entry: Not part of the Solaris operating system.
